reviews.text: Extremely functional, nearly spotlessly clean and cheap, the Formule 1 in Perpignan is just like any other Formule 1 in France and provides an extremely good value for money hotel to stay for a night or two. This Formule 1 is right next to the A9 and is right on the outskirts of the town. 2 bus routes go directly the town centre every 15 minutes or so and this takes about 20 minutes. Be aware, howewever, of breakfast timings!! Published (as with any other Formule 1) as served until 9.30am they finish between 9 and 9.15 here!! There's some good cafés in the town centre for breakfast though!
reviews.title: Functional
